name: codeyoujobboard
description: - **Clean up:** some styles like border radius is not the same on whole project.  - **Documentation:** Add it to the project as its lacking documentation in the whole project.      - Everyone pick a section and claim it in slack and document the section you claim.      - We need code documentation for each section      - [Example of DOC](https://gomakethings.com/whats-the-best-way-to-document-javascript/)     - Once you complete your section, have a team mate review your documentation  - **Make a how to:** For posting of the jobs.  - **Put in Real Jobs:** Put in jobs from Slack so that we can verify we have everything we need.  - **find a BackGround:** Add a background that has some geometric shapes or something with the blue currently used in the background   - **Mongo DB:** Everyone should make a mongoDB and connect to it.  - **Mongo DB:** Convert project to mongo!
